item.title: Golang: Block forever
item.description: Sometimes, you want to block the current goroutine when allowing others to continue. Here is some tricks I’ve collected: 1. References # Firstly give them some credits: https://blog.sgmansfield.com/2016/06/how-to-block-forever-in-go/ https://pliutau.com/different-ways-to-block-go-runtime-forever/ NOTE: I run these with Golang 1.12 2. The original # 1package main 2 3import "fmt" 4 5func show() { 6 for i := 1; i < 9696969; i++ { 7 time.Sleep(1000) 8 fmt.Println(i) 9 } 10} 11 12func main() { 13 go show() // The main goroutine is exited before the show() be done.
